flavorText:
"Beneath her scars, Dominaria's beauty yet shines."
—Multani, maro-sorcerer

foreignData.flavorText: „Unter ihren Narben leuchtet immer noch die Schönheit Dominarias." —Multani, Maro-Zauberer
foreignData.name: Panisches Beackern
foreignData.text: Zerstöre ein Land Deiner Wahl. Durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach einem Standardland Deiner Wahl und bringe diese Karte getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach Deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.flavorText: « Derrière ses cicatrices, la beauté de Dominaria continue de rayonner. » — Multani, maro-sorcier.
foreignData.name: Labourage désordonné
foreignData.text: Détruisez le terrain ciblé. Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base et mettez cette carte en jeu engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

name: Frenzied Tilling
originalText: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.
If the target land is an illegal target when Frenzied Tilling tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t search your library for a basic land card.

text: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
